mapper.select: SELECT b.YEAR, b.MONTH, b.DEPTNO, b.MONTH_AMOUNT as month_amount, d.DNAME as dname FROM M_BUDGET b JOIN DEPT d ON b.DEPTNO = d.DEPTNO WHERE (b.DEPTNO = #{deptno} OR #{deptno} = 0) AND (b.YEAR = #{year} OR #{year} = 0) ORDER BY b.MONTH
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO M_BUDGET (YEAR, MONTH, DEPTNO, MONTH_AMOUNT) VALUES (#{year}, #{month}, #{deptno}, #{month_amount})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM M_BUDGET WHERE YEAR = #{year} AND DEPTNO = #{deptno}
